resources.string: Ukuhambela akuhanjiswanga. Chofa ohlwini olungenhla lwamaklayenti ukukhetha amalunga omndeni ahambelayo (attending)
Yebo, maka lokhu kuvakasha njengosekuphothuliwe futhi ungikhiphe
Cha, susa futhi ubuyele ekuvakasheni okuqhubekayo
Lezizinsiza noma lezinhlelo zokusiza zinikezelwe kubani?
Kumele ukhethe okungenani usizo olulodwa (noma uchhofe inkinobho yokubuyela emuva ebhalwe (back) ukususa)
Kumele ukhethe okungenani iklayente elilodwa ukumaka loluhlelo lokusiza ngengolunikezeliwe
Khetha ingane uyikhethele ukuhlohlwa kwempilo yomntwana
Azikho izingane ezingaphansi kuka-5 ezimakwe njengezihambele lokuvaksha. Uyacelwa ukuthi ubuyele ewindini lokuqala ukushintsha ukuhambela

* Kunoma yiyiphi ingane egulayo ekwaziyo ukuphuza, yeluleka ukuthi inikezwe okuwuketshezi futhi iqhubeke nokunceliswa/funzwa

* Yeluleka ukuthi ingane igcinwe ifudumele uma ingane INGENAKHO ukushisa kwemfiva 
* Uma ingane ishisa ngokwemfiva yeluleka ukuba igqokiswe okulula ukuvumela ukuthi imfiva iphole

* Ukuze idluliselwe, thumela iSMS noma ufonele uMhlengikazi eThandanani; bhala incwadi yokuyidlulisela; siza umnakekeli nengane ukuba baye emtholampilo

* Yeluleka njalo ukuthi kunini lapho kufanele kuyiwe esikhungweni sezempilo:
      uma ingane ingakwazi ukuphuza noma ukudla
      uma ingane iba negazi emakakeni ayo
      uma ingane isigula kakhuludlwana
* Tshengisa umnakekeli ukuthi ilungiselelwa kanjani iORS bese inikezwa masinyane

* Yeluleka ukuthi kuthathwe izikhuthazi zezithako ze-zinc: kuphuzwe kanye nsukuzonke izinsuku ezingu 10; konezinezinyanga eziwu 2 kuya kwezingaphansi kwezinyanga ezingu 6 ubudala, uhhafu wephilisi izinsuku ezingu 10 (amaphilisi awu 5); konezinyanga ezingu 6 kuya eminyakeni engu 5 ubudala, iphilisi elilodwa izinsuku ezingu 10 (amaphilisi awu 10)
* Chaza ukuthi umntwana kungenzeka ukuthi udinga ama-antibiotics
Yedlulisela umntwana ukuze athole umgomo odingekayo
Xoxa kabanzi ngokubaluleka kwemigomo ukwenzela impilo yomntwana
